titleStmt.title: The speech of Sr. George Pudsey Kt. at the time of his being sworn Recorder of the city of Oxford in the Council-chamber of the same city, on Tuesday the eighth day of January 1683/4 where they agreed to the sealing the instrument sent by His Majesty
titleStmt.author: Pudsey, George, Sir, b. 1664?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Anthony Stephens ..., and are to be sold by Thomas Sawbridge ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
